divs: Sighting Detailsive been suspecting thinggs to happen since the 3-8-11 evnt and almost like a natrual insting came with the conclusion of the world is in danger because i didnt get any positive energy or vibes from that days event.plus the way there trying to cover this up had me more entersted. as i was reated and continued to look outside i seen star looking object to close and i started to flash my flashlight and it would dim and follow i and my cousins movement.also now a i write just seen a cigar looking object fleeing away toward the sun.i lost sight of because i came in surfing the web if anybody else is seeing what i was.
